posts.post_content:
Greetings,

I'm trying to finish my T218 set and was hoping some of you could help. I'm looking for ungraded/non-slabbed cards from P to VG+ condition. As long as I can read to backs and see the image, I'll be happy. I don't care about the tobacco brand or the factory number.

I also have bunch of T218 duplicates if anybody needs any. I can send you a list of what I have or you can message me. None have been professionally graded.

I'm also interested in Ogdens Pugilists and the Hassan Arctic (T30) sets if anyone has any extra of those ungraded.

I'm a new member on these boards but I have lots of good references on other hobbyist boards that I can point to. I'm willing to work with established members here. 

I may have a few non-T218 cards to trade for some of the more valuable T218 cards if needed.


Needed:
Thomas Hueston (billiards)
Abe Attell (boxing)
Knock-Out Brown (boxing)
Frankie Conley (boxing)
Al Delmont (boxing)
Battling Hurley (boxing)

Want to upgrade:
Lee R. Johns (bowling)
Percy Sellen (track)

Hey David, 

nice job on the T218's tough set to finish there a so many of them!

I have a few T30 dupes if u want to swap?

dupes: #2;19;20;22;24 (numbers from Forbes book).

TTYL!

Cliff
Pretty sure I have some of what you need, but it does grade higher than your stated range. LMK if I should dig them out. They are probably EX or thereabouts.
